mapper.sql: ID, DPRTCODE, WHDWID, WHRID, WHSJ, XFRDWID, XFRID, XFSJ, GBRID, GBRQ, GBYY, ZDBMID, ZDRID, ZDRQ, ZT, DTBS, WGBS, GBBH, GBMC, FJZCH, GBXFDWID, JH_WWBS, JH_ZXDWID, JH_ZXDW, JH_KSRQ, JH_JSRQ, WXLX, GZYQ, BZ, SJ_WWBS, SJ_ZXDWID, SJ_ZXDW, SJ_KSRQ, SJ_JSRQ, SJ_GZZ, SJ_JCZ, SJ_ZD, WGFKFJID

B.ID, B.DPRTCODE, B.WHDWID, B.WHRID, B.WHSJ, B.XFRDWID, B.XFRID, B.XFSJ, B.GBRID, B.GBRQ, B.GBYY, B.ZDBMID, B.ZDRID, B.ZDRQ, B.ZT, B.DTBS, B.WGBS, B.GBBH, B.GBMC, B.FJZCH, B.GBXFDWID, B.JH_WWBS, B.JH_ZXDWID, B.JH_ZXDW, B.JH_KSRQ, B.JH_JSRQ, B.WXLX, B.GZYQ, B.BZ, B.SJ_WWBS, B.SJ_ZXDWID, B.SJ_ZXDW, B.SJ_KSRQ, B.SJ_JSRQ, B.SJ_GZZ, B.SJ_JCZ, B.SJ_ZD, B.WGFKFJID
mapper.select: select b.id, b.zdrq, b.zt, b.gbbh, b.gbmc, b.fjzch, b.gbxfdwid, b.jh_wwbs, b.jh_zxdwid, b.jh_zxdw, b.wgbs, b.jh_ksrq, b.jh_jsrq, b.wxlx, b.gzyq, b.dprtcode,b.gbyy,b.gbrq,b.gbrid,b.sj_wwbs, b.sj_zxdwid, b.sj_zxdw, b.sj_ksrq, b.sj_jsrq, b.sj_gzz, b.sj_jcz, b.sj_zd,t.DPRTNAME as xfdw_dprtname, d.xlh as a_xlh,d.fjjx as a_fjjx,t1.username as gbr_username,t1.realname as gbr_realname,dprt.dprtname as dprt_dprtname from B_S2_007 b left join T_DEPARTMENT t on b.gbxfdwid=t.id left join d_007 d on b.fjzch=d.fjzch and b.dprtcode =d.dprtcode left join t_user t1 on b.gbrid=t1.id left join t_department dprt on b.dprtcode=dprt.id where b.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update B_S2_007 set WHDWID = #{whdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHSJ = sysdate, GBMC = #{gbmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GBXFDWID = #{gbxfdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JH_WWBS = #{jhWwbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, JH_ZXDWID = #{jhZxdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JH_ZXDW = #{jhZxdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JH_KSRQ = #{jhKsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, JH_JSRQ = #{jhJsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, WXLX = #{wxlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GZYQ = #{gzyq,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select: select b.id, b.dprtcode, b.whdwid, b.whrid, b.whsj, b.xfrdwid,b.zdrq, b.xfrid, b.xfsj, b.gbrid, b.gbrq, b.gbyy,b.zt, b.dtbs, b.wgbs, b.gbbh, b.gbmc, b.fjzch, b.gbxfdwid, b.jh_wwbs, b.jh_zxdwid, b.jh_zxdw, b.jh_ksrq, b.jh_jsrq, b.wxlx, b.gzyq, b.bz, b.sj_wwbs, b.sj_zxdwid, b.sj_zxdw, b.sj_ksrq, b.sj_jsrq, b.sj_gzz, b.sj_jcz, b.sj_zd, b.wgfkfjid ,t.USERNAME as whr_username,t.REALNAME as whr_realname,t1.dprtname as dprt_dprtname, d.xlh as a_xlh,d.fjjx as a_fjjx,t2.dprtname as xfdw_dprtname from b_s2_007 b left join t_user t on b.whrid=t.id left join t_department t1 on b.dprtcode=t1.id left join d_007 d on b.fjzch=d.fjzch and b.dprtcode=d.dprtcode left join t_department t2 on b.gbxfdwid=t2.id where b.dprtcode=#{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and b.fjzch =#{fjzch,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and b.zt =7
